metadata.title: CVE-2024-5701 on Ubuntu 20.04 FIPS Certified (focal) - medium
metadata.description: Memory safety bugs present in Firefox 126. Some of these bugs showedevidence of memory corruption and we presume that with enough effort someof these could have been exploited to run arbitrary code. Thisvulnerability affects Firefox < 127.

criterions.comment: firefox package in focal is affected and needs fixing.
thunderbird package in focal is affected and needs fixing.
mozjs52 package in focal is affected and may need fixing.
mozjs68 package in focal is affected and may need fixing.
